game.gui

Class GuiController

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.gui.GuiController

  • public class GuiController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles everything regarding the GUI.

      • circleClicked

        public void circleClicked(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
        Whenever a circle is clicked this method is called. The circleNumberProperty is updated to the according circleNumber. This value can be used by listeners. The listeners should check whether the value is equal to -1, if this is the case then the value should be discarded.
        Parameters:
        e -

      • chooseSquareScreen

        public void chooseSquareScreen(Position pos)
        Load the screen where a square can be chosen. The ones which you can choose from are in another colour.

      • rectangleClicked
